Or you may switch and wait at group creation screen

"Easy Install":

With Easy Install, Zapya automates installation to save the hassle of tedious waiting and clicking along the lengthy procedure. On starting Easy Install service, system will show a routine warning. Zapya promises never collecting your privacy through this service. 

If you force stopping Zapya or terminate it with a cleaning app, the Easy Install service will also be stopped. To avoid unexpected termination, please add Zapya to the white-list under the cleaning app settings.

Easy Install does not require root privilege. All Android 4.1 and above systems are supported.
Please find Zapya Easy Install service here and enable it.
Zapya Easy Install automates installation to save the hassle of tedious waiting and clicking along the lengthy procedure.
Failed to start Zapya Easy Install. Please enable it under settings.
Please enable above services in the system settings.
Enabling mobile data may be abused by the connected devices, please disable it.
Enabling mobile data for connected devices may be abused.\nPlease disable mobile data under pull-down menu of notification.
